definitions.definition: The basic unit of length in the International System of Units (SI: Système International d'Unités), equal to the distance travelled by light in a vacuum in 1/299 792 458 seconds. The metre is equal to 39 + ⁄ 127 (approximately 39.37) imperial inches .

main_definition: The basic unit of length in the International System of Units (SI: Système International d'Unités), equal to the distance travelled by light in a vacuum in 1/299 792 458 seconds. The metre is equal to 39 + ⁄ 127 (approximately 39.37) imperial inches .

definitions.definition: The rhythm or measure in language (especially verse ) and musical composition .

main_definition: ( UK , Canada ) The rhythm or measure in language (especially verse ) and musical composition .
